tweet: See Cardano has always been able to resist the censors!

Committing a 51% attack on #Cardano requires ownership of >1/2 staked coins. This may be ~15B $ADA so at the cost of ADA=$1, the attack costs ~$15B. For your imagination that's ~1000x more money than the current possible 51% attack to #Bitcoin.  Cardano #PoS will be very secure.  https://t.co/lBb0C2GIKd
The livestream tonight at 19.15 GMT +2 we’ll be charting and discussing the movements of crypto & $BTC + the following requests:  $TOMO $QNT $ADA $COTI  $LINK   YouTube:   https://t.co/ZyxhfYPt3M

#Cardano is a platform. Developers can create dApps using identity management, Oracles, and other tools. Users can use many valuable tokens within the applications. Cardano will protect the value of $ADA and all tokens including stable coins.  The potential is unimaginable.  https://t.co/s8unXdrbil
Hoskinson: Cardano rebranding to take place alongside Shelley launch  https://t.co/MJipvp12B9

Decentralized value transfer with a volatile token is not interesting for payment and business. Smart contracts on the #Cardano platform will allow sending stable coins backed by $ADA. The use of stable coins will push the price of ADA. The smart contracts will bring utility.  https://t.co/w9QHHHtaTQ

Adrestia is #Cardano's collection of APIs for developers (like exchanges) to easily integrate w/ Cardano & seamlessly keep up w/ upgrades to the protocols.  Dev solutions like this will make #Cardano the 1st stop for #blockchain developers of the future.   https://t.co/LHBPWKpU5o
South Africa may soon use #blockchain and #Cardano will be there. This is a very important step for adoption.
